title: Machen's Art of SCP-5140 (EVEREST)
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:basalt]]
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]
|| [[image http://waltz-sandbox.wdfiles.com/local--files/macheart-5140/EVEREST.png]] ||



[[div class="notation"]]
//Everest// is fanart of [[[SCP-5140]]] by [[*user Rounderhouse]]. You should read the SCP to understand the context, it's pretty short and worth it.

If your eyes are bleeding from looking at this, my job has been completed.
-----
[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/rounderhouse-s-author-page| rounderpage]]]
-----
